sqlQueries.SqlQuery: select 'ip.planning_entity' as tablename, planning_code as primaryKey, * from ip.planning_entity where last_updated_on > DATEADD(ww,-1,getdate())
select 'dbo.testing2' as tablename, planning_code as primaryKey, * from ip.planning_entity where last_updated_on > DATEADD(ww,-1,getdate())
